title: Eureka Robot Vacuum with Bagless Self Emptying Station, Robotic Vacuum and Mop Combo, 45-Day Capacity, 4000Pa Suction, Auto Lifting Mop, LiDAR Navigation, NER E10s BK
description: We know you value a clean home and Eureka is proud to offer whole home cleaning solutions to make life a little easier.

【Bagless Self-emptying Station】Say farewell to messy, wasteful cleaning with eureka E10s bagless self-emptying station. This system keep dust at bay for up to 45 days. What's more, its bagless design means you won't have to splurge on more dust bags, saving you up to $70 a year.

【4000Pa Suction Power】A spotless clean for a brighter home. Robot vacuum cleaner powerful suction can clean the hard floor and carpet more deeply, easy sweeping tangled cat and dog hair. Achieve remarkable cleaning results without multiple sweeps.

【CLEAN EDGE TO EDGE WITH ADVANCED FLEX-ARM DESIGN】: J15’s Rounded-Square Body and Flex-arm Design extends cleaning to reach all tight spots and corners, vacuuming and mopping closer to the edge eliminating stuck on stains and hidden dirt. Covering floors less than 1.36mm along the edge for precision cleaning.

【Precision LiDAR Navgation】More careful, Fewer troubles. LiDAR mapping enables smart sweeping routes that avoid repetition and omissions while detecting obstacles to improve sweeper safety. PSD technology helps clean corners and furniture edges.

【Meticulous Sweeping】2 in 1 Robot vacuum and mop combo can detect carpet and lift mop lifts on carpet, raises mop while returning to base for prevent dripping. Dual brush heads cover a wider sweeping area.

【Full-customized APP Control】E10s is easy as using your phone. The eureka robot app lets you customize the Multi-cleaning settings of E10s self-emptying robot vacuum and manage zones with accurate mapping. You can set no-go zones and schedule cleaning times for different areas. The robot only supports 2.4G Hz.
If you have any questions,contact our customer service team at 1-800-282-2886
